title: Science Centre Singapore Scientific Institution
blurb: Promotion of science and tech education for public.
description: The Science Centre Singapore is dedicated to promoting scientific and technological education for the general public. Located in Jurong East, it offers a variety of exhibitions, activities, and workshops designed to engage visitors of all ages. Key attractions include KidsSTOP™, Omni-Theatre, Snow City, and E.S.C. - ESCAPE @ SCIENCE CENTRE. The centre also hosts science shows, demonstrations, and competitions. With a focus on interactive learning, the Science Centre aims to inspire curiosity and foster a deeper understanding of science and technology among families and children. It provides various programmes for schools and corporate groups, ensuring an enriching experience for everyone.

title: KidsSTOP™: Interactive Science for Young Children
blurb: Interactive exhibits designed for young children!
description: KidsSTOP™ is an interactive science centre designed specifically for young children aged 18 months to 8 years. It offers a variety of hands-on exhibits and activities that encourage children to explore and discover the world around them through play. With different themed zones, children can engage in role-playing, experiment with simple machines, and learn about science concepts in a fun and engaging way. Perfect for families with young children, KidsSTOP™ provides a safe and stimulating environment for learning and exploration. Discover the wonders of science through interactive play.

title: Omni-Theatre: Immersive Dome Screen Experience
blurb: Experience movies on a large format dome screen!
description: The Omni-Theatre at Science Centre Singapore offers an immersive cinematic experience on a large format dome screen. Featuring a variety of educational and entertaining films, the Omni-Theatre transports viewers to different worlds and allows them to explore science and nature in a unique and engaging way. With its state-of-the-art projection and sound systems, the Omni-Theatre provides a captivating experience for audiences of all ages. Perfect for families and movie enthusiasts, the Omni-Theatre offers a memorable and educational outing. Discover the wonders of the universe on a giant dome screen.

title: Snow City: Singapore's First Permanent Snow Centre
blurb: Experience real snow at Singapore's first snow centre!
description: Snow City is Singapore's first permanent snow centre, offering visitors the opportunity to experience real snow in a sub-zero environment. With a variety of snow activities, including snow tubing, snow sculptures, and a snow playground, Snow City provides a fun and unique experience for all ages. Perfect for families and those looking to escape the tropical heat, Snow City offers a memorable and exciting outing. Discover the magic of winter in the heart of Singapore. Enjoy thrilling snow activities and create lasting memories with family and friends.
